SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SUM(1) OVER(PARTITION BY NULL) AS TOTAL_RECORD_COUNT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC) AS RNUM, TB.* FROM ( SELECT SEQNO, INTIME, BIZTYPE, YELLOWID_KEY, REQNAME, REQPHONE, CALLNAME, CALLPHONE, SUBJECT, MSG, REQTIME, RESULT, KIND, ERRCODE, SENTTIME FROM TSEB_MSG_T A WHERE 1=1
AND TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'yyyymmdd') BETWEEN #{params.searchFrom} AND #{params.searchTo}
AND ( A.CALLNAME LIKE '%'|| #{params.searchKeyword}||'%' OR A.CALLPHONE LIKE '%'||#{params.searchKeyword}||'%' )
ORDER BY A.INTIME DESC ) TB ) TA WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{params.firstIndex} + 1 AND #{params.firstIndex} + #{params.recordCountPerPage} ORDER BY TA.RNUM DESC
SELECT SEQNO, INTIME, BIZTYPE, YELLOWID_KEY, REQNAME, REQPHONE, CALLNAME, CALLPHONE, SUBJECT, MSG, REQTIME, RESULT, KIND, ERRCODE, SENTTIME FROM TSEB_MSG_T WHERE GROUP_CODE = #{groupCd}
